_sText: A very early prototype of what would become Left 4 Dead, set in a city during nighttime. This map has a lot of similarities to No Mercy's first map. In this prototype, there are a whopping 99 CT "zombie" spawnpoints compared to a mere 10 for the Terrorists (standing in for "survivors/humans") fighting knife-only CTs. This idea can still be seen in Left 4 Dead's unused strings mentioning this.
